}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== <small>''10-Port Unmanaged Switch Featuring Two 10G Ports''</small>
"48SSM201.0GA" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://foxnetwork.ru/images/stories/2018/asus_xg-u2008/hardware/asus_xg-u2008_hardware_10.jpg photos]. :OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]] SSM20 (1.0GA)
;[[ASUS XG-U2008]] *[[Marvell]] 88E6190X - [http://www.marvell.com/switching/link-street/ Link Street SOHO] 10G Ethernet Switch *[[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com.cn/guide/assets/data/marvell_transceivers_psg.pdf 88X3220] - [http://www.marvell.com/transceivers/alaska-x-gbe/ Alaska X 10G] Dual 10G port PHY Transceivers
<small> *Hyper-Fast 10Gbps Networking - The two next-gen 10G ports deliver incredible speeds of up to :10Gbps, perfect for ultra-busy networks and bandwidth-intensive tasks in any office or studio. *Easy to Use, No Setup Needed - Simply plug it in, connect your devices, and that’s it! No software or :setup is needed, and there are 10G signal quality LEDs to confirm your cables are working correctly. *Slim and Stylish Design - The tough all-metal design, iconic spun-metal finish and slim dimensions :make it a stylish addition to any premises. </small>
===Specifications=== *2x 10 Gbit Ethernet ports (10GbE - 10GBase-T) *8x 1 Gbit Ethernet ports (1GbE - 1000Base-T) *Three-color signal quality indicator LED *Data Rate: 10GBase-T: 20Gbps (Full-duplex) :Gigabit Ethernet: 2000Mbps (Full-duplex) :Fast Ethernet: 200Mbps (Full-duplex) :Fast Ethernet: 100Mbps (Half-duplex) *Performance - Forwarding Rate: :100Mbps Port: 148,800 packets/sec/ :1000Mbps Port: 1,488,000 packets/sec *Switch Fabric: 56 Gbps *Buffer Memory: 2048 Kbits *Jumbo Frame: up to 16 KB
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/new-materials/36-reviews/reviews/225-asus-xg-u2008 ''ASUS XG-U2008 10GBase-T Network Switch Review'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] *[http://edgeup.asus.com/2016/10/10/introducing-xg-u2008-10g-networking-249/ ''Introducing the Asus XG-U2008 10G network switch'' on '''EdgeUp|ASUS'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/10742/asus-xg-u2008-10gbase-t-network-switch-released-249-usd ''Asus XG-U2008 10GBase-T Network Switch Released'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[http://vr-zone.com/articles/asus-launches-xg-u2008-10gbase-t-network-switch/115784.html ''Asus launches the XG-U2008 10GBase-T network switch'' on '''VR-Zone''']
==See also== *[[ASUS XG-C100C]] - 10GBase-T PCIe Network Adapter ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/XG-C100C/ PPage] :10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100Mbps; RJ45 port and built-in QoS; Jumbo Frame: up to 9 KB *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - 10GBase-T PCI-Express LAN Card ([[Aquantia]] AQC107) • [https://rog.asus.com/articles/networking/bring-10gbit-ethernet-home/ PR] *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] (ROG Rapture Aura 10G) - AC9600 WiFi Gaming Router :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTG03H MSQ-RTG03H], IC ID: 3568A-RTG03H, PSU: 19V/3.42A *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC107]] - 5/10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card ([http://www.anandtech.com/show/11024/gigabyte-exhibits-an-aquantia-aqc107-based-10g-ethernet-pcie-card PR]) *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC108]] - 2.5/5GbE PCI-Express LAN Card
